vegData.heading: Ador Cafe
vegData.description: Ador is abbreviated from the word “Adorable” meaning “to love”. We founded Ador to inspire more people of all races and religions to go meatless because we strive hard to nurture our Mother Earth to be a more sustainable world by consciously consuming meatless food which leave lower carbon impact. Our team consisting of first-rate chefs and baristas is fully committed by serving only the finest meatless meals in Malaysia. Our earnest hope is to see our dearest customers WOW at their first meal in Ador and then return for the subsequent meals with their friends to prove to them that Ador’s meatless meals can be as good as or even better than the normal meat diets. Let’s influence more people to go meatless together! Yours Sincerely, Aery & Regina Remarks: All our food are vegan, vegetarian and Muslim-friendly. All food do not contain Allium vegetables such as garlic, onion, leek, shallot and chive.
vegData.address: LG1.07, KL Gateway Mall, 2, Jalan Kerinchi, Gerbang Kerinchi Lestari, , 59200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Alam N-Ion
vegData.description: We serve delicious home-cooked vegetarian meals, crafted with the healthiest ingredients and plenty of love. We also sell natural, handmade clay and wooden Buddhist crafts, health supplements, and homemade beauty products.
vegData.address: 15, Jalan 12/144A, Taman Bukit Cheras , 56000 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: All Vegetarian Mart
vegData.description: All Vegetarian Mart is a cafe-style vegetarian mart, with selected vegan options available. We delight you with a delicious range of Asian and Western cuisines, complemented with an assortment of quality beverages. Dine in and take away are available. Our mart features a range of quality groceries and products.
vegData.address: R-01-1 (First Floor), M-City Ampang 326, Jalan Ampang, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: AmazonVegan
vegData.description: AMAZONVEGAN is 100% vegan & tasty. Think fast food, but a healthier alternative. Serving burgers, tacos, milkshakes, sugar-free soft serve - everything produced in-house. No added sugar and no animal products! We believe in making alternative diet accessible and affordable for all. Connection beyond food, AMAZONVEGAN is a space of unity where anyone & everyone can share a moment of joy through delicious plant-based meals.
vegData.address: GF-02, 163 Retail Park, 50480 Mont Kiara , Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Annalakshmi Vegetarian Restaurant
vegData.address: 114-116, Jalan Berhala, Brickfields, Kuala Lumpur, 50470, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Ba Xian Vegetarian Court
vegData.address: 12,14,14-1, Persiaran Mergatua, Kepong Baru, Kuala Lumpur, 52100, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Bakti Woodlands Vegetarian Food Cafe
vegData.address: 55 Leboh Ampang (at near Masjid Jamek LRT station), Kuala Lumpur, 50100, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Berjaya Cafe
vegData.description: Berjaya Cafe, the epitome for the vegetarian lovers that brings the opulence, style, and is entwined with the gastronomic taste from the best chef’s in town. With the current trend of lifestyle that focuses not only on health and well-being, our Berjaya Cafe brings you the ambiance of a contemporary dining restaurant overlooking the skyline and magnificent city view of Kuala Lumpur. We also took measures to serve our guests with an edible selection of freshly picked ingredients. Choose from our variety spread of vegetarian cuisine, we can assure our guests will savour only the best in vegetarian gastronomic experience.
vegData.address: Level 14 West, Berjaya Times Square Hotel, No. 1, Jalan Imbi, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Beyond Veggie - Nexus Bangsar South Branch
vegData.description: A refreshing Meatless Dining Concept from Secret Recipe Cakes & Café Group. Extensive Menu range inspired by all fresh and natural products with a selection of natural products and ingredients with no colouring or preservatives, no MSG, just healthy and delicious choices! Beyond Veggie by Secret Recipe was short listed Best Healthy Eats in the Time Out KL Food Awards 2013 and 2014.
vegData.address: Unit G-8, Ground Floor, Nexus, No. 7, Jalan Kerinchi, 59200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Beyond Veggie - TTDI Branch
vegData.description: A refreshing Meatless Dining Concept from Secret Recipe Cakes & Café Group. Extensive Menu range inspired by all fresh and natural products with a selection of natural products and ingredients with no colouring or preservatives, no MSG, just healthy and delicious choices! Beyond Veggie by Secret Recipe was short listed Best Healthy Eats in the Time Out KL Food Awards 2013 and 2014.
vegData.address: Lot 54, Ground Floor, Jalan Tun Mohd. Fuad 1, Taman Tun Dr Ismail, 600000 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Biogreen Kepong Bukit Maluri
vegData.description: Made Fresh, Eat Fresh Every Day at Valentime! Valentime by Biogreen is a bakery that bakes only organic and healthy bread using the best ingredients including organic unbleached flour, unrefined sugar, grape seed oil, Biogreen products and other healthy ingredients. At Valentime Bakery, we believe that good luck comes with good health, we hope you enjoy every bite of the delightful bread as an organic gift of good health and luck.
vegData.address: No. 9 Jalan Burung Tiung, Taman Bukit Maluri, 52100 Kepong, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Blue Boy Vegetarian Food Centre
vegData.address: 6001 Blue Boy Mansion, Jalan Tong Shin (at Jalan Pudu Lama), Kuala Lumpur, 55100, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: BMS Organics (Pandan Indah)
vegData.address: 18-G&M, Jalan Pandan Indah 1/23A, Pandan Indah, Kuala Lumpur, 55100, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Boye Vegetarian Cafe
vegData.description: Here at Boye, we're a young, energetic team of people who are passionate about serving delicious, healthy, and fresh vegetarian food with a smile. We love what we do and the value we bring our local neighborhood. Please come and say hi to our friendly staff! You can also visit us online at www.boyecafe.com.
vegData.address: No.3, Block C, Jalan Semarak Api 2 (3/50), Diamond Square, Setapak, 53000 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan

vegData.heading: Brew Lodge Cafe
vegData.description: Welcome to Brew Lodge Café. A good day starts with coffee and you. We specialize in house-brand coffee beans, homemade cakes and toasts. Our style here is meatless cafe to encourage a healthy life and animal welfare. Without meat, with original food taste. We offer breakfast, lunch , brunch, dinner and desserts. From a hot latte, perfect soup of the day, signature buttermilk pasta to Black Laura waffle, we promise that it will be tasty and fresh.
vegData.address: 46, Jalan Bunga Tanjung 9B, 56100 Ampang, Wilayah Persekutuan
vegData.openTime: Mon, Wed - Fri: 11am - 9pm; Sat - Sun: 11am - 10pm; Tue: Closed

vegData.heading: Brownies Bar (Pavilion Elite)
vegData.description: Welcome to Malaysia's FIRST specialist brownies store ​Launched in 2016 by The Accidental Bakers, it is helmed by the King and Queen of Brownies; Hazwan Yazit and Ee-Lyn Tan.​With the biggest variety of flavours in town, our repertoire includes more than 10 flavours of our dark chocolate brownies and white chocolate blondies with more to come.
vegData.address: TL.1.111 Level 1, Pavilion Elite, Pavilion, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan
